thread.title: Pence to Receive ‘Working for Women’ Award
thread.title_full: Pence to Receive ‘Working for Women’ Award

author: Ed Brayton
title: Pence to Receive ‘Working for Women’ Award

organizations.name: slobs association of greater new york
racist white people of america foundation

text:
The Independent Women’s Forum, on whose board sits Baghdad Kellyanne Conway, is going to give Vice President Mike Pence, a guy who has done nothing but work against the interests of women in this country, its “Working for Women” award this year. 
Vice President Mike Pence will be awarded the “Working for Women” honor from the Independent Women’s Forum Wednesday despite years of working to hurt women. 
According to a release sent to New York Magazine, “the award recognizes an individual who values free markets, works to create a more dynamic and innovative work world, and celebrates the valuable contributions women make to society,” Jezebel reported Sunday. 
Pence was the real extremist on the ticket with a long list of victims. After fighting to take down Planned Parenthood in Congress for Indiana, he became governor and took it to a state level… 
Pence is scoring the award because Kellyanne Conway is on the organization’s board. Jezebel notes the irony of a group that celebrates “personal liberty” while awarding a man who opposes the personal liberty of women. 
In related news, Rep. Steve King is going to be receiving the Working for the Rights of Non-White People Award by the Independent Totally Not Racist White People of America Foundation and Donald Trump will be getting the Keeping His Hands Off Women Who Don’t Consent Award from the Fat Pigs and Slobs Association of Greater New York.
